price: 2 Allah, votre Maître, l’Omniscient, l’infiniment Sage, vous a indiqué le moyen légal de vous délier de vos serments[1452].
arabic: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qad faraḍa al-lahu lakum taḥillata aymānikum wal-lahu mawlākum wahuwa al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
